NSSystemDirectories(3) Library Functions Manual NSSystemDirectories(3)

NAME

The NSSystemDirectories API has been deprecated and replaced by sysdir(3) API.

HISTORY

The NSSystemDirectories API first appeared in OS X 10.0. Deprecated and replaced by sysdir API in in OS X 10.12, iOS 10, watchOS 3 and tvOS 10.

December 22, 2015 Darwin
